org.shared.stat.plot

Class GnuplotContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.stat.plot.GnuplotContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlotContext<GnuplotContext,GnuplotContext.Gnuplot>

    public class GnuplotContext
extends Object
implements PlotContext<GnuplotContext,GnuplotContext.Gnuplot>
    A Gnuplot-backed implementation of PlotContext.
